721-2040-energy cost per kWh.name: energy cost per kWh

723-2040-fuel tank cost per kg.comment: considers whole hydrogen storage system 7 bar

727-2040-CNG pump-to-tank leakage.name: CNG pump-to-tank leakage
727-2040-CNG pump-to-tank leakage.comment:
Leakage represented as a fraction of CNG input.
Includes leakage from Delivery, Station tank, Continuous leaks at stations, Fuelling nozzle, Vehicle fuel tank and Vehicle manual vent.
